roleset.name: surpass, go past
roleset.note: OVERTAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overtake' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from overtake.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Polyvinyl chloride capacity ``has overtaken demand and we are experiencing reduced profit margins as a result,'' said John D. Ong, chairman and chief executive.
